titleStmt.title: R. G. Allison et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5125

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
To his Excellency
Thos E Bramlett
Govr of Kentucky
Frankfort
Ky-

We the undersigned citizens of Elkton and vicinity. would respectfully represent that prior to the last term of the Todd Circuit Court our fellow Citizen, and townsman Willis L. Reeves a very estimable young man just entering upon the practice of the Law entered as Surety on bail bond for the appearance for in Said Court of one Sampson Snorden, to answer a charge of felony which bond said Snorden not appearing was forfeited at the last term of the Said court, wherefore we would most earnestly request your honor to interfere and forbid all further proceedings to enforce the Same.

Very respectfully your obdt Srvts
R G Allison
G H Corson
W H Hall
Frank H. Bristow
James M. Gill
J Crabb
C D Reeves
D. A Cole
Ed. M. Shanklin
W T F Slaughter
D K Nichols
J. C. Russell
Bernhard Wolf
Jas I. Clark
L R Irvin
S M Kennedy
W T. kennedy
S H Grooms
F. M. Perkins
G. Long
J. H. McReynolds.
J R Roberts
J. D. Russell
Alex Campbell
J A Russell
J G Hollingsworth
M. Levy
S. W. Miller
S F, Washington
W. Washington
H. R. Clark
G F Luckie
S Black
D Black
J C
J S McSelve
P. G Edmond
R. F. Christian
W H Grumbly
J M Linn
W B Harrison
H G Bibb
H G. Petrie
